about_the_game:
XZ: XL is a game on the edge of two genres – RPG and survival horror.

One year has passed since the Zombie apocalypse happened. You are trying to survive in a world full of chaos and incessant violence. The competition for the remaining resources between the living people has increased.
Now your enemies are not only Zombies but also other groups of the survived people.

Particular features of the game:
  • over 10 hours of a captivating match-3 game.
  • original fight mechanics.
  • numerous classes of weapons and outfit.
  • new parameters of the characters (strength, endurance, etc.).
  • opportunity to choose physical appearance of the characters.
  • free movement on the world map.
